text:
Visited Late afternoon on public holiday. Was not crowded. Was attended to immediately. Food and drinks ok.
Noise level tolerable except when staff cleans the table after customer left and began dragging/pushing chairs back after cleaning the area! Learn to lift the chairs guys!

Great place to enjoy with decant food n also Friendly service!!

The Live Band "THE VELVET" was EXCITING and INTERESTING, Strong lead vocals, interaction with dine in customer was 💯💯💯💯🔥🔥🔥👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽
Hope Hard Rock keep the Band "THE VELVET" permanently!!

Hard Rock Cafe Puteri Harbour is an absolute must-visit destination that perfectly captures the essence of rock ‘n’ roll while offering a delightful dining experience. As soon as you step inside, you’re greeted by a vibrant and energetic atmosphere, adorned with iconic memorabilia that pays homage to legendary musicians. The ambiance is electric, making it a perfect spot for music lovers and food enthusiasts alike.

The menu boasts a tantalizing variety of dishes, and the burgers are truly a standout. The juicy patties are cooked to perfection and served with a delectable array of toppings that elevate the flavor profile. I also enjoyed their signature cocktails, which are as creative as they are refreshing.

The service was exceptional; the staff was friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu, enhancing our overall experience. Whether you’re looking to grab a quick bite or enjoy a leisurely meal, Hard Rock Cafe Puteri Harbour caters to all.

In addition to the great food, the live music adds a unique charm, making it a fantastic spot to unwind. Overall, Hard Rock Cafe Puteri Harbour is a vibrant hub that offers a memorable dining experience, and I highly recommend dropping by if you’re in the area!
The grilled salmon was a bit dry.. brownies with ice cream are amazing! Great service by Asyraff 👍🏾👍🏾

Location: at B2. Difficult to find. Rm5 per parking per entry.

Atmosphere: have live band during dinner time. Difficult to have decent conversation. Best if you enjoy music while eating.

Food: love it but it’s quite pricey.

Waitress: im expecting their being friendly, but they are so into their work.
